item.title: Go Lock Performance Traps: From sync.Mutex to Spinlock Tuning
item.description: A seemingly simple concurrent Map access, performance crashes under high concurrency. pprof shows 90% of time spent in sync.Mutex.Lock. This post documents the investigation and performance comparison of different lock strategies.

item.title: Go Singleflight Deep Dive: Preventing Cache Stampede with One Line of Code
item.description: In high-concurrency scenarios, cache stampede can crush your database. Singleflight solves this with an elegantly simple design.
